member.name: T:Neovolve.Toolkit.Workflow.Activities.ApplicationSetting`1
member.summary: The class is a workflow activity that returns an application configuration value.
member.typeparam: The type of value to return.
member.remarks: The configuration value is obtained from a instance. The instance is resolved from DomainContainer.TryGetCurrent. If no exists with a registration for , the instance is obtained from ConfigurationStoreFactory.Create.

member.name: T:Neovolve.Toolkit.Workflow.WorkflowExtensionElement
member.summary: The class is used to provide configuration support for adding the to the configuration of a service.

example.para: The following configuration adds an extension to the service.
example.code: <?xml version="1.0" ?> <configuration> <system.serviceModel> <behaviors> <serviceBehaviors> <behavior name="ExtensionBehavior"> <workflowExtension type="Neovolve.Toolkit.Workflow.Extensions.InstanceManagerExtension, Neovolve.Toolkit.Workflow"/> <workflowExtension type="MyApplication.SingleInstanceExtension, MyApplication" isSingleton="true"/> </behavior> </serviceBehaviors> </behaviors> <extensions> <behaviorExtensions> <add name="workflowExtension" type="Neovolve.Toolkit.Workflow.WorkflowExtensionElement, Neovolve.Toolkit.Workflow"/> </behaviorExtensions> </extensions> <services> <service behaviorConfiguration="ExtensionBehavior" name="Neovolve.Toolkit.IntegrationTests.Communication.TestService"> <endpoint address="" binding="basicHttpBinding" bindingConfiguration="" contract="Neovolve.Toolkit.IntegrationTests.Communication.ITestService"/> </service> </services> </system.serviceModel> </configuration>

member.summary: Defines the attribute name for the error handler type.

member.summary: Defines the attribute name for the is singleton value.

member.summary: Stores the set of properties for the element.

member.summary: Gets the type of behavior.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the extension.

member.name: P:Neovolve.Toolkit.Workflow.WorkflowExtensionElement.IsSingleton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the extension is a singleton.
member.value: true if the extension is a singleton; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: Only one instance of the extension will exist for the if is true. A new instance of the extension will be created for each in the if is false.

member.summary: Gets the collection of properties.
member.returns: The of properties for the element.

member.name: M:Neovolve.Toolkit.Workflow.Extensions.InstanceManagerExtension.MapValues(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object},System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Object})
member.summary: A host invokes this method after it is done with collecting the values in the first stage. The host forwards two read-only dictionaries of values it collected from all persistence participants during the first stage (CollectValues stage) to this method for mapping. The host adds values in the dictionary returned by this method to the collection of write-only values.
member.param: The read-write values to be persisted.
The write-only values to be persisted.
member.returns: A dictionary containing additional write-only values to be persisted.

member.summary: Destroys the handler by handler instance id.

member.name: T:Neovolve.Toolkit.Workflow.Activities.BusinessFailureScope`1
member.summary: The class is used to provide scope management of business failures in a workflow.

remarks.para: This activity uses the workflow execution property with the name of BusinessFailureTracker{T}.Name to obtain values. A instance is then created with these failures. No exception will be thrown if the execution property does not contain any failure values.
The execution property is typically populated by executions of child activities.

member.summary: The activity execution index.
